name: C. Array Beauty
statement:
Let’s call beauty of an array b_1, b_2,
ldots, b_n (n > 1)
min
limits_{1
leq i < j
leq n} |b_i - b_j|.You’re given an array a_1, a_2,
ldots a_n and a number k. Calculate the sum of beauty over all
subsequences of the array of length exactly k. As this number can be
very large, output it modulo 998244353.A sequence a is a subsequence of
an array b if a can be obtained from b by deletion of several (possibly,
zero or all) elements.
